black.$description: Primary text (dark). WCAG AAA: 16.1:1 on paper-white

dark.$description: Secondary text (dark). WCAG AAA: 12.7:1 on paper-white

medium.$description: Tertiary text (dark). WCAG AAA: 7.0:1 on paper-white

faint.$description: Decorative only (dark). NOT for readable text. Contrast: 2.6:1

primary.$description: Primary accent (dark). WCAG AA: 7.5:1 on paper-white

primary-hover.$description: Primary accent hover (dark). WCAG AA: 10.2:1 on paper-white

primary-pressed.$description: Primary accent pressed (dark). WCAG AA: 5.5:1 on paper-white

success.$description: Success accent (dark). WCAG AA: 9.8:1 on paper-white

success-hover.$description: Success accent hover (dark). WCAG AA: 12.5:1 on paper-white

success-pressed.$description: Success accent pressed (dark). WCAG AA: 7.2:1 on paper-white

warning.$description: Warning state (dark). WCAG AA: 11.3:1 on paper-white

warning-hover.$description: Warning hover (dark). WCAG AA: 12.8:1 on paper-white

info.$description: Info state (dark). WCAG AA: 9.4:1 on paper-white

info-hover.$description: Info hover (dark). WCAG AA: 11.6:1 on paper-white

base.$description: Error state (dark). WCAG AA: 6.5:1 on paper-white

bg.$description: Error background (dark). Decorative, not for text

border.$description: Error border (dark). Decorative, not for text
